summary: This bill, the Modernization, Accountability, and Planning for Broadband Funding Act (MAP for Broadband Funding Act), aims to improve the efficiency of federal broadband funding by modernizing the Broadband Funding Map. It mandates the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), in coordination with the National Telecommunications and Information Administration (NTIA), to collect and analyze data. The bill also requires a Government Accountability Office (GAO) study on the roles of federal agencies in maintaining the map and ensuring data completeness, focusing on improving coordination and data collection efforts for more effective broadband deployment.
